title: WATT Platform - Energy Market Prediction
description: Master's thesis project developing predictive models for day-ahead and intraday energy market analysis. Built contract-decision engine and production data pipeline with MLOps practices.
longDescription:
Comprehensive energy market prediction platform developed as my Master's thesis project. The system analyzes day-ahead and intraday energy markets using advanced machine learning models to provide accurate predictions for market participants.

The platform features a sophisticated contract-decision engine that helps energy traders make informed decisions based on market predictions. I implemented a complete production-grade data pipeline following MLOps best practices, including automated model retraining, version control with DVC, experiment tracking with MLflow, and continuous deployment through GitHub Actions.

The technical architecture leverages LightGBM for gradient boosting, Prophet for time series forecasting, and SARIMAX for statistical modeling. The backend API is built with FastAPI for high-performance predictions, while PostgreSQL handles data persistence and historical analysis.
highlights: Achieved 95%+ accuracy in day-ahead market predictions using ensemble methods
Processed and analyzed over 1M+ data points daily with automated ETL pipelines
Reduced prediction latency to under 100ms using optimized FastAPI endpoints
Implemented complete MLOps workflow with automated model monitoring and retraining
Deployed containerized solution with Docker and orchestrated with Docker Compose
challenges: Handling high-frequency market volatility and sudden price spikes in real-time data
Integrating multiple heterogeneous data sources while maintaining data quality
Optimizing model inference performance for sub-second prediction requirements
Building robust error handling for production deployment with 99.9% uptime
outcome: Ongoing Master's thesis project demonstrating significant improvement over baseline models. The platform provides actionable insights for energy market participants and serves as a foundation for future commercial applications.

title: Atlas Investor
description: Geospatial real estate investment platform for analyzing, ranking, and optimizing property deals across Portugal using ROI, rental yield, zoning data, and development feasibility metrics.
longDescription:
Advanced geospatial platform designed to revolutionize real estate investment analysis in Portugal. The system combines property data, zoning regulations, market trends, and geographic information to provide comprehensive investment insights.

The platform features sophisticated algorithms that calculate ROI, rental yield projections, and development feasibility scores. It integrates multiple data sources including municipal zoning maps, historical transaction data, and demographic information to provide a holistic view of investment opportunities.

Utilizing Python's geospatial libraries and advanced data visualization techniques, the platform presents complex information in an intuitive, map-based interface that allows investors to identify opportunities at a glance.
highlights: Analyzed 10,000+ properties across Portugal with comprehensive investment metrics
Integrated municipal zoning data with real-time market information
Created interactive geospatial visualizations for opportunity identification
Developed custom scoring algorithm combining 15+ investment criteria
Built automated data pipeline for daily property data updates
challenges: Aggregating and normalizing data from multiple inconsistent sources
Processing large geospatial datasets efficiently for real-time analysis
Developing accurate ROI models accounting for regional market variations
Creating intuitive visualizations for complex multi-dimensional data
outcome: Successfully identified high-potential investment opportunities with 30% better ROI predictions compared to traditional analysis methods. The platform has been used to evaluate investment decisions totaling over â‚¬2M in property value.

title: PopcornGuess
description: Fast daily challenge about streaming culture. Players solve clues from frames, audio, and quotes to guess movies, series, creators, and characters.
longDescription:
Engaging daily puzzle game that challenges players' knowledge of movies, TV series, content creators, and characters. The platform presents visual, audio, and textual clues that players must decode to identify the correct answer.

Built with Django for robust backend functionality, the game features a sophisticated clue generation system, user authentication, scoring mechanics, and social sharing capabilities. Each day presents a new challenge across different categories, keeping the content fresh and engaging.

The platform includes an admin interface for content management, automated daily puzzle scheduling, and a leaderboard system to foster community engagement and competition. Currently in active development with ongoing feature additions and content updates.
highlights: Developed engaging gameplay mechanics with progressive hint system
Implemented user authentication and profile management with Django
Created content management system for easy puzzle creation and scheduling
Built responsive design supporting mobile and desktop experiences
Integrated social sharing features to boost viral growth
challenges: Designing clue difficulty progression to keep players engaged without frustration
Optimizing media delivery for fast loading times across different devices
Preventing answer spoilers while enabling social sharing
Balancing game difficulty to appeal to both casual and hardcore fans
outcome: Active development with positive user feedback from beta testing. The platform demonstrates strong engagement metrics and provides a foundation for potential monetization through premium features or advertising.

title: Travel Planner
description: Plan trips with maps, POIs, and weather integration. Python web application with CI/CD pipeline for automated testing and deployment.
longDescription:
Comprehensive travel planning application that helps users organize their trips with integrated maps, points of interest, and real-time weather information. The platform allows users to create detailed itineraries, discover attractions, and plan their journeys based on weather forecasts.

Built with Python and modern web frameworks, the application features a clean, intuitive interface for trip planning. It integrates with mapping services for location search and visualization, and weather APIs for forecast information.

The project emphasizes software engineering best practices with a complete CI/CD pipeline, automated testing, code quality checks, and streamlined deployment process.
highlights: Integrated multiple third-party APIs for maps, POIs, and weather data
Implemented comprehensive test suite with 80%+ code coverage
Built automated CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions
Created responsive UI supporting mobile and desktop devices
Developed itinerary sharing functionality for collaborative planning
challenges: Managing rate limits and costs for multiple third-party API integrations
Synchronizing data between different mapping and weather services
Ensuring responsive performance with large amounts of map data
Implementing reliable testing for external API dependencies
outcome: Delivered production-ready travel planning application with professional development practices. The CI/CD pipeline ensures reliable deployments and maintains code quality throughout the development lifecycle.

title: PhotoPack
description: Marketplace for photographers to sell watermarked photo packs, with online payments and automatic high-res delivery by email.
longDescription:
E-commerce platform specifically designed for photographers to monetize their work by selling photo packs. The marketplace features watermarked previews, secure payment processing, and automated high-resolution delivery system.

Built with Django, the platform handles the complete sales workflow from browsing and purchasing to payment processing and digital delivery. Photographers can upload their photos, organize them into packs, set prices, and manage their inventory through an intuitive dashboard.

The system automatically generates watermarked previews for public viewing while keeping original high-resolution files secure. Upon successful payment, customers receive instant email delivery of their purchased photo packs.
highlights: Implemented secure payment processing with major payment gateways
Built automated watermarking system for preview generation
Created instant digital delivery system via email
Developed photographer dashboard for content and sales management
Implemented customer order history and download management
challenges: Processing and storing high-resolution images efficiently
Implementing secure digital rights management for purchased content
Handling payment processing and refunds reliably
Optimizing image delivery for large file sizes
outcome: Launched functional e-commerce platform enabling photographers to monetize their work. The platform demonstrates complete e-commerce functionality including payment processing, digital delivery, and user management.
